docTitle.titlePart:
Elektrochemische Synthesen, IV [1]
Metallcarbonylverbindungen der Eisengruppe

front.note:
Electrochemical Syntheses, IV [1]
Metal Carbonyl Compounds of the Iron Group Elements

byline.docAuthor: Joseph Grobe* und Bernd Heinz Schneider

byline.affiliation: Eduard-Zintl-Institut für Anorganische Chemie der Teclmischen Hochschule Darmstadt,

front.keyword:
Electrochemical Synthesis, Iron Carbonyl Compounds, Nickel Carbonyl Compounds,
Cobalt Carbonyl Compounds
front.div:
The electrochemical synthesis of iron, cobalt, and nickel carbonyl compounds from
metal acetylacetonates of oxidation state + II or + III and from metal anodes is de-
scribed, solvent effects and the problem of cluster formation are discussed.
